project.name: medeco-hcp-app
project.flow: Project app landing screen → Our offerings → Generate DDx

captureSequence.description: DDx Welcome and Introduction Screen - Purple gradient background with 'Welcome to DDx' header, card showing 'Revolutionize Diagnosis with AI' with features and 'How it works' steps
keyFeatures: Welcome to DDx header with AI logo
Revolutionize Diagnosis with AI hero section
Why Trust Our DDx section with 4 trust points
How it works section with 3 steps
Video thumbnail for 'How Differential Diagnosis Works'
Question cards for various medical specialties

captureSequence.description: DDx Scrolled State - Same screen as Node 1 but with scrollable content area showing full card content including extended 'How it works' section
keyFeatures: Same purple gradient background as Node 1
Shows complete 'How it works' section with all 3 steps
Sticky positioning for smooth scrolling UX
Interactive cursor pointer on scrollable area
differences: Node 1: Static view with limited content height (662px)
Node 2: Scrollable view with extended content (1483px)
Node 2 has overflow-y-auto on card content

captureSequence.description: DDx Flow Start - Patient gender selection screen with Male/Female radio options
keyFeatures: Header: 'Generate DDx' with back arrow and refresh icon
Prompt text: 'Let's get started! To begin, please select the Patient's Gender from the options below'
Two radio button options: Male (selected with blue checkmark), Female
Male option has purple/blue border indicating selection
captureSequence.notes: Design context fetch failed - captured screenshot only. This is the first screen of the DDx generation flow after clicking from landing.

captureSequence.description: Patient age selection with scrollable number picker

uiComponents.header: Generate DDx with back arrow and refresh icon

completedStep.description: Shows completed gender selection with edit capability

currentPrompt.text: Great! Please select the Patient's Age

agePicker.styling: Purple/blue border on selected, hand cursor icon on 19

keyFeatures: Shows progression: Gender completed → Age selection in progress
Edit icon on completed gender selection
Scrollable age picker with touch/drag indicator
Blue gradient action button at bottom
captureSequence.notes: Screenshot only. Age picker component is interactive with scroll functionality.

captureSequence.description: Symptoms input screen with completed steps and example prompts

uiComponents.header: Generate DDx with back arrow, refresh icon, and NEW: fullscreen/expand icon

currentPrompt.title: Thank you! Now, please add the Symptoms
currentPrompt.description: along with any relevant details like the patient's history, past data, or clinical findings for better accuracy.

cards.text: Chest pain with shortness of breath at night

inputField.styling: Large text area with rounded border

keyFeatures: Shows 2 completed steps with edit capability
captureSequence.notes: Screenshot only. This is the symptoms input screen - critical for DDx generation.

captureSequence.description: DDx results showing diagnosis list with tabs and document attachments

uiComponents.header: Generate DDx with back arrow, refresh, and fullscreen icons

inputSummary.text: experienced 5 kg weight loss in one month, frequent dizziness (moderate) lasting minutes, and persistent fatigue (severe) for three months, affecting daily activities.

warningNote.text: Note: To generate more accurate DDx results, refine your prompt by editing it.

resultsPrompt.text: Your DDx has been generated. Please find the results below.

disclaimer.text: Disclaimer: These results are generated by AI and should be used as a guide, not the final source for patient treatment decisions.

keyFeatures: Purple medical icons for each diagnosis
Red dashed labels for 'Most Likely Diagnosis'
captureSequence.notes: Screenshot only. Main results screen with diagnosis list - key deliverable of DDx flow.

captureSequence.description: History screen showing past DDx generations in chronological list
